sentences.english: Poles can be held in place by using threading to brace them against a ceiling joist.
sentences.chinese: 钢柱可以用一个支架固定在一个有天花板的地方。

sentences.english: Fire-resistant experiments on two full scale steel columns are first presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了两个足尺钢柱的耐火试验。

sentences.english: Finish round steel columns by framing around them with 2x4s.
The exposed concrete ceiling floats 60 centimeters above the peripheral walls using steel columns.
sentences.chinese: 露石混凝土天花板利用钢柱浮在围墙上方60厘米。

sentences.english: Steel beams radiated outward from the core, supporting the floors and attaching to the exterior columns.
sentences.chinese: 钢梁自钢芯向外伸出，支撑地板以及连接外部的钢柱。

sentences.english: Local buckling is the dominant failure mode for composite steel column.
sentences.chinese: 局部屈曲是组合钢柱常见的失效模式之一。

sentences.english: Question and countermeasure presented when being connected with concrete of original under-part and first steel column.
sentences.chinese: 首节钢柱与原下部混凝土柱的连接问题及对策。

sentences.english: Primary frame made of steel columns and beams.
sentences.chinese: 主钢构由钢柱和钢梁组成。

sentences.english: The foundation is made of cyclopean concrete footings and steel columns.
sentences.chinese: 该建筑的基础是由毛石混凝土底脚和钢柱组成。

sentences.english: Two ends of the columns were supported with knife-edges and permitted to rotate around strong axes.
sentences.chinese: 柱两端采用单向刀口支座，允许钢柱绕强轴转动。

definition: a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
a boom (i.e. transverse beam for hanging objects)
to construct by hoisting ready-built components into place
